column4: Shanah Tovah to the Jewish community! This weekend as you celebrate #RoshHashanah among family and friends, I wish you a safe and healthy New Year!

That President #TrumpKnew the dangers of this deadly virus and intentionally downplayed it, further validates that he is unfit to be president. Of the nearly 190K lives lost and 6.3M+ positives, how many would be spared had our president not treated this crisis like a ‚Äúhoax‚Äù?

A happy first day of school should be safe. Many schools will open their doors today w/o much needed equipment to mitigate COVID-19 spread. The Senate must pass the Heroes Act, which includes $58B for K-12 schools. The lives of students, faculty, & staff could depend on it.

Labor Day is not a random day off; it‚Äôs the recognition of unions' labor and strategic, persistent organizing. As we enjoy this day, let's thank our local unions for their efforts to ensure employers offer a safe, fair work environment for all, even during COVID-19. #LaborDay2020

Just as wearing seatbelts saves lives, wearing masks saves lives. You can put yourself in harm‚Äôs way, but you have no right to transfer that harm to others. There have been more than 5M COVID-19 cases and 160K+ deaths in the U.S.
This virus kills.
Save lives.
üó£WEAR YOUR MASK

Cutting Social Security and Medicare would cut retirement and health care security for many seniors across our nation who have worked hard throughout their lives. We cannot allow this President‚Äôs executive order to rob them of these necessities.

This pandemic has threatened our lives and our livelihoods. Too many Americans are on the brink of financial ruin without the HEROES Act and @RepMaxineWaters' Emergency Rental Assistance Act. As Senate Republicans stall, Americans continue to suffer needlessly. Rent is due.

5000+ evictions have been filed in Harris County since the pandemic began. 40% of Houstonians can't afford rent. Senate Republicans must #StopEvictions and implement #RentReliefNow. Stop this tsunami of evictions and looming housing crisis from destroying countless lives.
